Class GlobalScale

  • java.lang.Object

            • org.pepstock.charba.client.GlobalScale
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasLabels, IsDefaultScale

    public final class GlobalScale
extends AbstractScale
    Default global scale (maps the java script object Chart.defaults.scale and the result of Chart.scaleService).
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
